meta.job_title: Senior Consultant, Managed Care Contracting and Strategy

duties_responsibilities.duty: Understand and communicate the value of products to clients, building trust and long-lasting relationships.
Collaborate with internal teams to facilitate client needs and improve processes.
Identify, grow, and maintain strong relationships with payors on behalf of clients.
Collect, analyze, and manage client and consumer data to drive informed decisions.
Maintain accurate records, resolve complaints, and identify industry trends to improve client experience.
Recruit, onboard, train, and coach new hires, providing oversight to maintain turnaround time for tasks.
Participate in new client Kick-Off presentations, acting as a subject matter expert and mentor for the team.

education_certification.credential: College degree in Business, Management, Healthcare Administration, or related field (Master's preferred)
